name: swift-swim
effect: This Pokémon's Speed is doubled during rain. This bonus does not count as a stat modifier.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Boosts the Pokémon’s Speed stat in rain.
